pages.disclaimers: Disclaimers - MansionResort Hotel MansionResort HOME ABOUT US Casino Contact Disclaimers This website is provided “as is” without any representations or warranties, express or implied. MansionResort Hotel makes no representations or warranties in relation to this website or the information and materials provided on this website. Rules and Conditions Before participating in our casino games, please familiarize yourself with the rules and conditions that govern your participation. These rules are provided for your safety and enjoyment. Responsible Gaming Enjoy gaming in moderation. Participation in gambling should be entertaining, not problematic. If you feel that gaming activity starts to negatively affect your life, seek help. We support responsible gaming and provide tools for self-limitation. Security We strive to ensure the safety of our visitors. Our premises are equipped with surveillance and security systems for your comfort and protection. Without prejudice to the generality of the foregoing paragraph, MansionResort Hotel does not warrant that: this website will be constantly available, or available at all; or the information on this website is complete, true, accurate, or non-misleading. Nothing on this website constitutes, or is meant to constitute, advice of any kind. If you require advice in relation to any legal, financial, or medical matter you should consult an appropriate professional. MansionResort Hotel reserves the right to discontinue or alter any or all of our website services, and to stop publishing our website, at any time in our sole discretion without notice or explanation; and save to the extent expressly provided otherwise in these terms and conditions, you will not be entitled to any compensation or other payment upon the discontinuance or alteration of any website services, or if we stop publishing the website. Limitations of Liability MansionResort Hotel will not be liable to you (whether under the law of contract, the law of torts, or otherwise) in relation to the contents of, or use of, or otherwise in connection with, this website: to the extent that the website is provided free-of-charge, for any direct loss; for any indirect, special, or consequential loss; or for any business losses, loss of revenue, income, profits, or anticipated savings, loss of contracts or business relationships, loss of reputation or goodwill, or loss or corruption of information or data. These limitations of liability apply even if MansionResort Hotel has been expressly advised of the potential loss. Exceptions Nothing in this disclaimer will exclude or limit any warranty implied by law that it would be unlawful to exclude or limit; and nothing in this disclaimer will exclude or limit MansionResort Hotel's liability in respect of any: death or personal injury caused by MansionResort Hotel's negligence; fraud or fraudulent misrepresentation on the part of MansionResort Hotel; or matter which it would be illegal or unlawful for MansionResort Hotel to exclude or limit, or to attempt or purport to exclude or limit, its liability. Other Parties You accept that, as a limited liability entity, MansionResort Hotel has an interest in limiting the personal liability of its officers and employees. You agree that you will not bring any claim personally against MansionResort Hotel's officers or employees in respect of any losses you suffer in connection with the website. Without prejudice to the foregoing paragraph, you agree that the limitations of warranties and liability set out in this disclaimer will protect MansionResort Hotel's officers, employees, agents, subsidiaries, successors, assigns, and sub-contractors as well as MansionResort Hotel. Unenforceable Provisions If any provision of this website disclaimer is, or is found to be, unenforceable under applicable law, that will not affect the enforceability of the other provisions of this website disclaimer. Consent By using our website, you hereby consent to our disclaimer and agree to its terms. Update Should we update, amend, or make any changes to this document, those changes will be prominently posted here. pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy - MansionResort Hotel MansionResort HOME ABOUT US Casino Contact Privacy Policy Your privacy is important to us. It is MansionResort Hotel's policy to respect your privacy regarding any information we may collect from you across our website and other sites we own and operate. 1. Information We Collect We only collect information about you if we have a reason to do so, such as providing services to you, improving our services, or communicating with you. The information we collect may include: Contact information (e.g., name, email address, phone number) Payment information (e.g., credit card details) Demographic information (e.g., age, gender, location) Usage data (e.g., website interactions, preferences) 2. How We Use Your Information We may use the information we collect in the following ways: To provide and maintain our services To improve our services and website To personalize your experience and deliver tailored content To communicate with you, including sending promotional emails To process transactions and fulfill orders To comply with legal obligations 3. Security of Your Information We take appropriate measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure. 4. Sharing Your Information We may share your personal information with third parties only in the following circumstances: With your consent For legal reasons (e.g., to comply with legal process) With service providers who help us operate our business For business transfers (e.g., in connection with a merger or acquisition) 5. Your Rights You have the right to: Access and update your personal information Withdraw consent for processing your information Request deletion of your personal information Object to the processing of your information The MansionResort website uses cookies to ensure you have the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline.
